title: ACID Pro 10 [PC Download]
description: You got an idea - ACID Pro 10 has the tools! The creative DAW is the ultimate instrument for today's artist and producer: Work with the new zynaptiq STEM MAKER 2. Record on different tracks simultaneously, play virtual instruments and create unique songs and remixes with high-quality loops. Enter unknown spheres of sound design with the new ACID Morph Pads, change pitch and tone of your audio with the Celemony Melodyne essential plug-in or get inspired by the redesigned MIDI Playable Chopper with transient detection and its unique ACIDized workflow.ACID Pro 10 - the next generation of sampling.
